attributes.action: recognise that size discrimination is unacceptable and to be outlawed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fat and thin people in the UK are being discriminated against on a daily basis.  It affects may areas of their lives.  These areas include employment and research shows that fat people are not being employed due to their size.  This is prejudicial and disciminatory and there is no legal support to stop this.
